SELECT EEU.PLNT_CD, EEU.EQM_CD, EEI.EQM_NM, EEI.CRG_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USER_ID = EEI.CRG_UID) AS CRG_NM, EEU.USE_SEQ, EEU.USE_STR_DS, EEU.USE_END_DS, EEU.PITM_NM, EEU.ANS_NO, EEU.BATCH_NO, EEU.AITM_NM, EEU.ANS_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USER_ID = EEU.ANS_UID) AS ANS_NM, EEU.RMK, NVL(EEI.EQM_FILE_IDX, 0) AS EQM_FILE_IDX FROM EM_EQM_USE EEU LEFT JOIN EM_EQM_INFO EEI ON EEI.PLNT_CD = EEU.PLNT_CD AND EEI.EQM_CD = EEU.EQM_CD LEFT JOIN SY_USER SU ON EEI.PLNT_CD = SU.PLNT_CD AND EEI.CRG_UID = SU.USER_ID WHERE EEU.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND EEU.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND UPPER(EEI.EQM_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{eqmCd}) || '%'
AND UPPER(EEI.EQM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{eqmNm}) || '%'
AND UPPER(EEI.MAK_COMP) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{makComp}) || '%'
AND UPPER(EEU.PITM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{pitmNm}) || '%'
AND UPPER(SU.USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{crgNm}) || '%'
AND UPPER(EEI.SPL_COMP) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{splComp}) || '%'
AND UPPER(EEI.SRL_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{srlNo}) || '%'
AND EEU.USE_STR_DS BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{useStrDs}) AND TO_DATE(#{useEndDs})
AND EEU.USE_END_DS BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{useStrDs}) AND TO_DATE(#{useEndDs})
ORDER BY EEU.UDT_DS DESC

AND UPPER(EEI.EQM_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{eqmCd}) || '%'
AND UPPER(EEI.EQM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{eqmNm}) || '%'
